GisILineStringSegment Class Reference

#include <ILineStringSegment.h>

Inherits GisICurveSegmentAbstract.

Inheritance diagram for GisILineStringSegment:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisILineStringSegment class is a LineString curve segment type. The shape of GisILineStringSegment is the set of positions defined by the contained collection, plus linear interpolation between consecutive points. This is a helper type for Geometries in the Geometry package.

Note:
It does not derive from IGeometry.
